vote.title: Reappointment of Lark Mallory, Mallory Economic Development Advisors, to serve on the RiverSouth Development Authority Board of Trustees as a citizen member with a new term expiration date of June 22, 2026, but shall continue to hold over into one or more subsequent terms until a new local government representative member is duly appointed or elected to serve for the remainder of such term.(résumé attached)
vote.description:
Title
 
Reappointment of Lark Mallory, Mallory Economic Development Advisors, to serve on the RiverSouth Development Authority Board of Trustees as a citizen member with a new term expiration date of June 22, 2026, but shall continue to hold over into one or more subsequent terms until a new local government representative member is duly appointed or elected to serve for the remainder of such term.(résumé attached)
